title: Should we first touch ground with Knees or Hands, when going for Prostration (Sujood)? Assimalhakeem
transcript: Nigeria says when we go for prostration what should touch the ground first the knees or the hands it's an issue of dispute among Scholars inshallah both opinions are valid I personally choose to land on my hands first to soften the fall on my knees and this is the choice of Sheikh Al albani may Allah have mercy on his soul uh his second question
